extendedInfo.description: Bible.is offers mobile access to more languages and Bible translations than any other Bible App, and includes dramatized Bible Audio and The JESUS Film Project. READ the Bible, LISTEN to the Bible, and SEE the Bible as never before with anyone in the world.â FREE Holy Bible, sharing the word of God in over 700+ languages.â Download text and audio Bibles for offline reading and listening anytime, anywhere.â Search for keywords, book names, and specific verses.â Bookmark, highlight, and add notes. Youâre one tap away from simple Bible study tools.â Select Favorite Bibles like ESV or KJV for quick access.â Watch Bible Video! See Godâs Word come to life in 61 video segments from The JESUS Film Project.  Available in many languages with new languages added regularly.â Share any Bible verse via Facebook, Twitter, SMS, Email, or Copy in just a tap.â Stay in sync. With a free Bible.is Account, access bookmarks, highlights, and notes on Bible.is Online (www.bible.is) and your other devices.â Localized Bibles based on your device language: Arabic, Chinese , English, French, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, Russian and more...BIBLE.IS LANGUAGESHere are a 'few' of the Bibles available (full list: www.bible.is/languages)Arabic, AshÃ¡ninka, Bafut, Bulgarian, Cebuano, Chinese Mandarin, Chinese, Cantonese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Ewe, Finnish, French, German, Guaymi, Haitian, Huasteco Veracruz, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Korean, Latin, Malagasy, Mezquital, Ngiemboon, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Somali, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese, ...many more!A MINISTRY OF FAITH COME BY HEARINGâ Bible.is, a ministry of Faith Comes By Hearing (FCBH) a 501c(3) non-profit ministry dedicated to reaching the worldâs poor and illiterate with the Word of God in Audio. All US donations are fully tax deductible.JOIN THE BIBLE.IS COMMUNITYEmail Support with ideas and concerns from within your Bible.is App or support@bible.is.Join our growing international community on Facebook: www.Facebook.com/Bibleis.Follow us for daily scripture on Twitter: www.twitter.com/Bibleis.Access more resources at Bible.is Online: http://bible.is.

reviews.title: Wonderful!
reviews.comment: Splendid app! Love that I can listen to the word while I am driving, and read along with it.! Awesome!
reviews.author: Khary Green

reviews.title: great to use
reviews.comment: the new format is easy to use, much more advanced and with more useful tools that come in handy!!!! Carry your Bible everywhere!!!
reviews.author: Atiqa Kelsy

reviews.title: Love this Bible!
reviews.comment: It does everything I want! Great resource! I also love being able to watch the Jesus movie with each section I read!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very thorough and great reference tools and very easy to use.
reviews.comment: Would like to be able to download the 1699 Geneva translation because it is one of the first translations into the English language please let me know if you can make a copy for download thanks very satisfied customer Don
reviews.author: Don Meyers

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I love the app. If you are constantly on the go, you have the option to listen to the Word of God by downloading the audio portion of this app. Or if you have quite a bit of time you may read the Word. To all who have used this app  or are just now downloading it, I am certain that God will bless you with the knowledge that lies within the greatest book that will ever exist and God Bless you all.
reviews.author: William Foster

reviews.title: Well done.
reviews.comment: I love this dramatize version.  I listen to and hear the Bible very clearly.  My Gama loves it too and lissen to it when she is holding my baby cousin.  Gama says to me, \'Dora and Diego will not get you to Dream Land, only this will.  I love Dream Land that\'s where Jesus and his Father lives\'.  God bless you.
reviews.author: Syniah Chambers

reviews.title: HOLY BIBLES BATMAN!!!
reviews.comment: Perfect for all of us to use God\'s powers given to mankind technology to gracefully learn his great words of wisdom to our instruction manual of the heavenly life with peace on earth! I CAN FLY! - Jonny Raven - A.K.A. SUPERMAN!
reviews.author: Jonathan Lamendola

reviews.title: Simply Awesome. 5 Star App.
reviews.comment: Easy to use. Decent look. I love this app. GOD BLESS THE DEVELOPERS.
reviews.author: Nitin Justa

reviews.title: Great, rock solid app. Audio portion is excellent.
reviews.comment: Wonderful for quiet times or a long commute
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A huge part of my walk
reviews.comment: The very first thing I do in the morning is listen to a few chapters of God\'s Word. I am on my fourth time through. I listen while I am doing dishes or other mundane tasks, and even while driving. I watch the videos pertaining whatever I happen to be studying. My walk with God has been accelerated since I downloaded this over a year ago. I am so thankful for this app, because it took away the excuse if lack of time to read God\'s word.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No icon for Bible Is on Android Phone
reviews.comment: I see that I have successfully installed your app.  The only problem is their is no icon on my phone for me to find it.  I have to pull up the Play Store, type in Bible Is on the search bar to \"open it\".  I wish it was on my icons.
reviews.author: Ellie Zemlicka

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: Love this app! I prefer it to other audio bibles, because it includes the text and lets me read along. I only gave four stars because there\'s no option to repeat a chapter or passage. Also needs more versions with both text and audio. Thank you for this app!
reviews.author: Jane Vidal

reviews.title: The App of ALL App\'s !
reviews.comment: This App is ULTIMATELY the Greatest, due to it\'s contents. It would be  Ultimately, ULTIMATE if it contained other cultures Bibles. (Such as the Qu\'ran ect.)
reviews.author: Hayward Jackson

reviews.comment: Excellent app, very user friendly. Making God\'s Word accessible!
reviews.author: Margot Garcia

reviews.title: Offline reading
reviews.comment: Thank You Bros. Please remove this disturbing message \"please check the network connection under settings\" for offline reading. Also, please make it remember the last verse position even in Offline reading. Thank you.
reviews.author: Sudheer Kumar

reviews.title: Good and very helpful
reviews.comment: Am happy to have the Bible in my phone it helps me to be who am i today it encourage me to build up my mind and my strength all the time i thank God for my life
reviews.author: Anne Akrofi

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: It is awesome, no complaints. I also love the fact that I can change the version at any time and it will continue to play without me having do anything. I highly recommend it!
reviews.author: jessica haughton

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: Love this. Explains it so good with feeling. All who believe should get this. Why can i get the N.I.V. New international version. Please record that book. That would really make this great app.
reviews.author: David Little

reviews.comment: I love this app. I like it cause you can read it , listen to it or both at the same time. I also like it cause you if there is a verse you want to share with someone you can send it Thur a text, email or put it on FB. There many reason why life love love love Bible is.
reviews.author: Robin Jarrell

reviews.title: This bible audio
reviews.comment: This bible audio is truly awesome it is like if they were there the way they.  Bring it out and it so very helpfull
reviews.author: Helen Lynch
